attributes.action: fixed rate for companies wether post payment or prepayment
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a fixed rate for energy providers whether it be pre-payment or post payment. 
It is absolutely ridiculous that the people who are worse off have to prepay for their energy and they  suffer because they are charged higher rates, which will never be equal or ever help them to get out of the deficit that they’re in. It doesn’t make sense that whether you’re on a prepayment or post payment meter and use the same electricity that the amount is different because you pay for it before you use it or you pay for it after you use it. It’s disgusting that people who are unable to get credit or gain a post payment meter have to suffer with higher payments or charges because they are in an awful predicament.
attributes.background: I would like a fixed rate for energy providers whether it be pre-payment or post payment.
